lead_paragraph: The most memorable events included a food-court rager for Opening Ceremony, club night with Jeremy Scott, and, as usual, Kanye West.

headline.print_headline: Not Everyone Is a Football Fan
headline.main: The Flashiest Parties of New York Fashion Week

snippet: The most memorable events included a food-court rager for Opening Ceremony, club night with Jeremy Scott, and, as usual, Kanye West....
abstract: Parties of New York Fashion Week attract hordes of A-list celebrities and fashionistas.
